reviews.review_text: We got an Airbnb down the street and found this to be the nearest restaurant,looked at the menu and even though we didn t have a reservation it was absolutely my lucky day that they were sweet to accommodate us on a 2-top table. Jose s service was great, even though it was a super busy night, but like in a good Italian restaurant I loved how we were not rushed and enjoyed our time. We hit yo try the crab tower, which I wouldn t have expected but flavor was incredible! One of the best Carpaccio s I ve ever had, being one of my favorite Italian dishes and have had in many places and countries! flavor was absolutely on point, antipasto was excellent in every bite, followed by a fantastic and light Gnocchi with white sauce. I wish we had space to try the creme brulee, but we did take a Tiramisu to go and didn t disappoint! Atmosphere was lovely, restaurant was beautiful! It truly made our night in Vancouver, wish we could come back tomorrow but it was fully booked as well. Thank you so much!

Wonderful restaurant.  Follows historic restaurant mantra and experience.  Great setting, ambiance, the food presentation, waiters/waitress knowledge of the menu, and the owner walking around chatting with patrons.  Very cool. Light Italian music playing in the background, easy to have conversations and not feel like you are yelling.  Yet with a full restaurant, did not feel loud. Food was very tasteful and savory.  Each overseen by chefs and owner.  Fresh catches of the day were great.  You can tell the food was done by those knowledgeable of what they are making.

Incredible evening. One of my besties is so smart she books amazing restaurants months in advance during prime weekend nites and times ...I was lucky to be invited to one. I just love this restaurant.  Its kind of like a whose who in Vancouver ...older crowd but you know its a sophisticated but fun crowd. Our server Nicole was excellent . I told her how her knowledge of the menu was so appreciated and she helped us create the best dinner experience for our table . We started with fresh crisp breads and homemade breads made in house ( rye, sourdough and foccacia) all were delicious but the foccacia was pillows soft. We had the crab avocado tower which was on special , delish. Beet and burrata salad....very generous with the mouth watering burrata. The Caesar salad was super good too ...I would get then to chop up the romaine for u . Clam vongole incredible (so many clamssss) and then this other fancy pasta with like huge rigatoni style pasta with spicy sausage....Im drooling as I write this . Finally new year steak ...perfection . Desserts kill me now ....sorbet raspberry and pear were light and refreshing.  The warm chocolate cake was very good as well....overall was an amazing evening.  The atmosphere was just perfect, server was amazing, company was the best and the food was  .  Thank you again !!

Amazing experience AGAIN!  We ve been coming here for 18 years. Best bison carpaccio I ve ever had. Service was friendly and professional. Pasta was hot & delicious. Wine choices are wide. Umberto himself works the room, visiting tables and shaking hands. He s a legend. (Oh and there s valet parking!)

One of the best dining experiences in town. Perfect for intimate dinners or large groups. Get the chef s choice when you have lots of people and be surprised. Service is always exceptional and the wine list extensive. Prepare for good convos, delicious food and a welcoming atmosphere.

One of my fave restaurants inside. The outdoor part is just amazing. My party didn t want to sit outside, which is only kind of outside but we sat right by it and by the kitchen. It s such an amazing spot. Entertaining spot for kids too who like to watch all the action. The food was great too lol. Sablefish just melted in my mouth.

Absolutely love   this place. We ve been going here for years since pre Covid and after and it s still one of the best restaurants in Vancouver. Do yourself a favour and visit here at least once in your life. My gf and I shared the 38oz Porterhouse Fiorentina steak   and it was hands down the best steak we ve ever had!! I also ordered their Calamari and then Cheesecake for dessert   yum From the wonderful service to the amazing chefs, dishes and environment this place is legendary. And oh, once it s nicer out book yourself a table in the outdoor villa area and it s just gorgeous outside. Cheers   to 2023 all!!

This is a magical place! We sat in a beautiful courtyard. It looked like we were in  Italy. The service was impeccable and the food was second to none! Ive included a picture of the vip menu I had for my birthday celebration. We loved every bite! I will definitely come back to this restaurant for special occasions!

My best Italian food experience in Vancouver. Always drive by here and see fancy cars nearby and I knew this place is good lol Had the luck to sit in the backyard today (first day to have patio open this year), I felt like eating in Tuscany, it was really cozy and relaxing. The manager Bobby and our servers were excellent, top notch service. Pasta were fabulous, the veal ossobuco was beyond my expectation though it looked average! Lamb rack and halibut were savoury too. Tiramisu and gelato were excellent. Overall we enjoyed the dining experience. One thing I found it interesting is most of the patrons here are elder white people, I guess this is where the old money comes to indulge themselves.

Great service. They sat us outside when we requested. Tucson vibes. Also great for people watching. You ll meet an interesting crowd you don t see anywhere else in Vancouver. People are dressed up so time to put something nice on if you re dining here. Happy with our server and the food quality was great too.

My recent visit to Giardino Restaurant was an absolute delight. The warm and inviting ambiance created the perfect setting for a memorable dining experience. The staff at Giardino were exceptional, providing attentive and knowledgeable service that made me feel truly valued. The culinary creations at Giardino are masterpieces, with expertly crafted dishes that showcase a perfect balance of flavors and innovative combinations. Each bite was a burst of flavor and artistry, thanks to the fresh and high-quality ingredients used in the dishes. The menu offers a wide variety of options, catering to different tastes and dietary preferences. The restaurants commitment to using locally sourced ingredients adds an extra touch of freshness and sustainability to the dining experience. The elegant interior design and beautiful outdoor seating area added to the overall charm of the restaurant. From appetizers to desserts, every dish was presented with attention to detail and a creative touch. Giardino Restaurant truly offers an exceptional dining experience, perfect for special occasions or a memorable night out. I cant wait to return to Giardino and indulge in their culinary delights once again.
Giardino never disappoints. Consistently good Italian food.
Beautiful placer, ver y elegante and classic, and food... fantastic!

One of the best Italian meals I have had in quite some time. The food quality and selection was tremendous, the service was exceptional, and the wine and cocktails topped it all off! Would absolutely recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for good Italian in vancouver, just make a reservation early!!

Sat at the chefs table, which provided lots of entertainment for our meal time. The food was phenomenal. The deep fried buffalo mozzarella was great as our appetizer. Our main courses were great, and for dessert, I had the cheesecake (which was so light and almost whipped) Great food and atmosphere!
Awesome experience again. Sat at The Chef s Bar. Saw the crew in action. Best Carbonara in town. Vanessa was amazing. Highly recommend.

Family dinner. The food was delicious  and we agreed it was better than we could cook at home. Service excellent and the waitress had a detailed knowledge of the menu. Thoroughly enjoyed our evening Food

From the moment I walked in and they greeted me to the end when I payed the check the staff was friendly and professional. The food was fantastic oysters to start and lobster bisque then the sable fish. Probably the best lasagna Ive ever put in my mouth .I highly recommend this restaurant .
Absolutely the best Itailian Restaurant on the west coast. The food was spectacular and the service reflecting this fine restaurant. I cant say enough about the food, the flavors, and the people.

The restaurant is very good The service was friendly, though not initially prompt when first seated, our waitress Larissa made up the slack and was kind and made our experience a good one. We will return as it is a special place for us and it is tried and true.

Absolutely amazing service! Our server was super attentive and she was very friendly. Backdoor patio was heated so wasn t cold at all even in the evening, space was beautiful and vibe was as if I was in Italy. Food was pretty good - especially the appetizer menus were great! Would highly recommend for a special night.

This place is AMAZING!! we had a small team dinner of 5 here and ordered the thinly sliced octopus with crispy prosciutto and lemon, the oysters, carbonara, lasagna, seafood frutata, tiramisu and pistachio gelato!!! everything was delicious!! and the staff was very attentive!! love this place!! you should definitely go!!

Came here last minute and we were lucky to get a reservation within 30 minutes on a Friday night. We dined outside in the garden and it was lovely. Our service was phenomenal from the moment we stepped through the door until we left. Our server helped us pick a bottle of wine and is very knowledgeable about the menu. We ordered an appetizer, had mains each and shared their tiramisu. Each of them were amazing! I d come back again for sure.
Beautiful atmosphere and exceptional service complement some of the best Italian food in Vancouver.   A classic member of the citys fine dining scene and always a good choice for a great evening out.

A lovely restaurant with good food and drinks, top notch service, and a high end but warm atmosphere. A great restaurant for a special occasion. Valet parking. Very expensive! Even for a high end restaurant, the prices are a little bit shocking IMO.
An unforgettable experience! Superb staff, awesome food, and great ambiance. This Italian restaurant truly delights in every way. Highly recommended!
Amazing experience. The food and service are amazing. Felt right at home and part of the family as soon as we entered the restaurant. Definitely will return again.
Went for a date here with my husband, great place. Very friendly staff, excellent food! My husband got the filet (very good) and I got the halibut (best Ive ever had).

The waitress was really nice, the food was amazing, and the restaurant was beautifully decorated. The owner even came to our table for a bit and seemed like one of the most interesting men Ive ever seen. Amazing

First time at Giardino. The mains and dessert was excellent. I couldn t choose between two pastas and had a split of fettuccine with parma prosciutto and petit pois in a light cream sauce, and paccheri di gragnano with spicy italian sausage, pecorino cheese. They were both flavourful and delicious. Our server was Andrew and he was very excellent and we really enjoyed our interaction with him. Look forward to going back.
I ate really good gluten free noquis, Good atention, good atmosphere, the place is well decorated and good wine, definitely I recomended it...
This has to be my all time favorite restaurant! Ive been going to Giardinos for 20 years and have never had a bad experience or meal! They never disappoint!

A fantastic experience here. The decor was warming and welcoming, service was professional. Food was very enjoyable, had the calamari as appy and it was fresh and seasoned on point. Then the funghi risotto was spot on too. Main course was scallops, and it was magnificent. The wines by glass on offer were well selected, and overall, I would definitely go again.

Always having amazing time and food in this restaurant.  They also have very good tasting wine list.  I find they have good pasta yet the main dishes are outstanding. Last time we had sable fish and lobster pasta with beef carpaccio with endless champagne by glass(can t remember how many but the flavour and serving temperature was just   ). Atmosphere was amazing. Highly recommend

Struggled to get a reservation online but called the restaurant and they were able to squeeze us in! The food was absolutely delicious and the service was impeccable. We had one of the pasta specials and the pasta with spicy Italian sausage and cheesecake and the semi-freddo for dessert. Cannot wait to come back!
We had a table of 15 and we all felt well taken care of. The food was delicious especially the seared tuna and the desserts were exquisite. Highly recommend this restaurant.
Once again, I enjoyed a lovely dinner at the bar.  Service was top-notch, and the food was scrumptious, selecting the specials this evening.  Until next time.

We celebrated our daughter s 16th birthday there tonight. Our first time dining here and are very impressed with everything we ordered, tasty and well presented. Service was excellent and our server made us feel welcomed and very taken care of. The restaurant has a lot of charm and character. We had an enjoyable time here and will definitely come back.
Always a treat to dine at this long standing establishment.  Food/wine, service and atmosphere hits it out of the park.

We celebrated our anniversary at Giardino and it was a great choice! Nice ambience and excellent food. My husband had steak and I had lasagna, they were both absolutely delicious! Service was good, but we missed some warmth from the waitress , she was fast and courteous, but no smiles, felt distant. Price is a little expensive, but nothing crazy, you get what you pay for. I will definitely go back!
We had an amazing anniversary dinner! Delicious food and wonderful service! Looking forward to come back soon!

Amazing and very pleasant service. Despite its reputation for Italian food, the seafood was excellent. Food was fresh and the vegetables were well made. The cannoli for desert was marvelous. Highly recommended for special occasions.
Lovely authentic Italian food in a cozy atmosphere. Time slips by when you dine here!  (Could have been the fabulous wine..)

An amazing restaurant, definitely my favorite. Never disappoints. The staff are all so friendly and knowledgeable. The food is unbeatable, my favourite pasta is definitely the carbonerra and you must get the tiramisu! The patio is also beautiful, very European!

The food was amazing, and very prompt and attentive and genuine service from Meghan even though they were full on a Tuesday. The owner clearly cares as he was there greeting all of the guests. My new favourite restaurant in Vancouver, a must if you are in the area! Thank you for the beautiful night!

Always exceptional food and great service. Pricey but one of the best places for Italian food in Vancouver (tied with Cioppinos for me). The outdoor seating is unparalleled in Vancouver. The indoor seating can be quite noisy at times. Great spot for celebrations, work dinners or date nights (or a I dont want to cook Wednesday). The pastas are delicious and half orders are available for the starter course. Veal chop is always a winner for a main

I love the Slow Oven-Braised Veal Ossobuco. Its very well cooked with the wonderul sauce and the saffron risotto. The wine recommendation as well paired well with the veal. There were pre-appetizers too which was a nice touch. I definitely would recommend for a fancy date night or a fancy dinner with friends.

I m not the biggest fan of lasagna, but ordered it so my husband would get the best of both worlds and have his favourite lasagna. It was the BEST LASAGNA I ve ever had. My daughter had the Carbonara and it was delicious as well. My husband had the veal and it was so tender and yummy. The wine list is amazing. Wide selection of many great wines. A few BC wines and many from all around the world. The menu has lots of Italian favourites, I ll be sure to come back.

Service is prompt and professional Spacious restaurant with ample seating The bread they give you with try balsamic and olive oil is amazing Ordered the pasta Spaghettini Carbonara Tossed with Pancetta, Egg Yolk & Fresh Pecorino (it s gets really salty at the end but still good) and lasagna (solid choice) Came to celebrate an occasion and it was a lovely place to dine, would come back!

Il Gardino restaurant is aja jaja jaj absolutely fantastic! From the inviting ambiance to the attentive staff, it offers a memorable dining experience. The cuisine is exquisite, with fresh ingredients and innovative flavors. The presentation is artful, and the wine selection is impressive. Il Gardino is aja jaja jaj great for any occasion!

We have dined at Giardino many times, our last experience was exceptional. The food was expertly prepared and presented, full of flavor and thoroughly enjoyed. Service was attentive, without being too over bearing. It is always a treat to be in such a warm, beautiful and inviting room with such welcoming staff.

Giardino is our family tradition. It is our favourite restaurant and we are sure to visit every holiday season. The staff is so warm and knowledgeable. The food quality is always fantastic and the personal touches cannot be ignored. Our son loves coming to  fancy  dinner at Giardino and on this occasion, he was treated to a holiday treat courtesy of the management team and it made his night. Bobby, as always, was a joy to connect with. We cannot thank you enough for the detail and experience you build for each guest that walks through your doors. We will see you soon.
Sable Fish was amazing. The chicken just melted right off the bone. Server was great and lots of options to adjust the menu.
Great experience. Celebrated two birthdays with my girlfriends. Food was amazing, recommendations were exceptional. Thank you Meghan for the great service!
Everything was excellent. We will definitely be back.

Visiting Vancouver after many years away and we wanted a special place. Consigliere highly recommended and didn t disappoint. It was packed but in a good way. We were seated right away. Our server was Anthony but it might as well been the owner himself. He had a certain elegance and panache to his introduction and how he greeted us. We went with our two young daughters and were dazzled by the beautiful artwork and vibrant atmosphere. He explained the Italian menu and dumbed it down for us. The girls wanted spaghetti. When the food arrived it was first class service. The calamari the pasta the white fish and the lobster bisque were all perfect. Even our picky eaters ate all the spaghetti. For anyone that wants to go out and splurge just one time in their lives this is the place.

This restaurant is in a beautiful setting, very classy style.  Food was very good. Lots of variety to choose from.  Seabass special and rack of Lamb were very tasty.  The burata salad and ahi tuna were great starters.  Lovely restaurant and is on the pricey side but the food is excellent if you want to splurge.
Amazing food and service! Pasta is amazing and the lamb and Sable fish photod below
Great place dine with friends and family. The food and service are outstanding, we highly recommend. Thank-you!

Really nice dinner experience eating on their beautiful courtyard patio.  Food was very good and the service was down-to-earth and efficient.  The only downside was a 2-hour seating limit.  It felt a little rushed for their prices.  2.5 hours for smaller groups would be just about right.
You cant say enough about this place! The food, the service, the atmosphere is always top-notch and consistently one of the best in the city if not the province.

Me and my wife came to Giardino a couple weeks ago and we sat at the table right in front of the kitchen. By far the best experience we ve had in Vancouver at a restaurant. The food and service was unbelievable but what blew us away was the girl working the appetizer station. She was so personable and made our experience 10/10. Not only did she make fantastic recommendations but we loved watching her zip around the kitchen. She was so fun to talk to and deserved every bit of the tip we gave her. Will definitely be coming back to sit at the kitchen bar table

Went here with my sister to try their seared venison loin but ended up ordering much more than what we originally planned. We enioyed the meats, easy to cut and chew so we love our meat dishes--they were cooked peefectly too! The desserts we had after our meals are very delicious and to die for. I really like their tiramisu, the sweetness that is just right (for me) and the serving size that is not too little and not too much. Dietary restrictions: They have offerings under healthy options. Parking: Wheelchair-accessible parking lot. Wheelchair accessibility: Wheelchair-accessible entrance, seating, and washroom.
Great atmosphere, superb pasta!

Came here on Friday the 3rd, somehow got a reservation 1hr before we came on a Friday night! The host was very nice, pulled out our seats for my mother and I. Our waitress was so fun and friendly, honest about her opinions with the food which was amazing! One of the best pasta bowls I ve had- pricey but worth it.
One of my favourite restaurants in Vancouver. The atmosphere, the drinks & the yummiest Italian food are all top notch. Not to mention how excellent their service is.

Had the most lovely time here for my birthday. We were let in about 10 minutes later than our reservation (likely due to the rain keeping people in) but it was well worth the wait! Our server Meghan was the sweetest and the food was all outstanding. The burrata was perfect. The pasta was flavourful. The scallops paired well with every component on the plate. We cant wait to come back!
Great Italian food and oustanding service. Imagine delicate cuisine from the shores of Capri, this is place to go. Enchantment2
Great service from Giovanna! The food was amazing and the restaurant is lively. Highly recommend! Pro tip: ask for Giovanna.
If you dont mind paying the price, this is a standby choice for the food and experience.

All guests in our party agreed that Giardino has the best service out of all restaurants in Vancouver. Literally. The go above, beyond and much further. Food was delicious too. The only thing is I wish portions were bigger. The applied were good, pasta and desert on the smaller side. I had room left for the desert and left not stuffed like a pig but I wish there was more food.
Food
Wonderful food. Very convenient place near where I stay. Service was great! Lively outdoor seating area

Service was impeccable, food delicious, and great atmosphere in the restaurant. Highly recommend. Lobster bisque was perfect amount of lobster flavoring and cream. The pasta stated spicy Italian sausage, but wasnt much spice at all. Couldve had a bit more kick in it but was still very good.

One of the best meals I have ever had, the octopus carpaccio was out of this world. Server was extremely helpful in selecting delicious wines to complement each dish. A hidden gem in the heart of Vancouver

Great first experience at Giardino. The service was excellent and attentive. Food was on point. We shared a number of appetizers and pastas and then had our own entrees. Of the dishes ordered, the Cannelloni, the Rack of Lamb and the Osso Buco were our favourites. As for dessert, the Cannoli, Semifreddo and Tiramisu were so good and the perfect way to end the meal.

We dined here on a Tuesday evening to ensure the best possible service and Giardino s did not disappoint. The room is elegant and spaciously arranged (appropriate to current restrictions). Dinner was delicious and the whole evening a treat beyond words. M. Menghi took the time to visit our table and say hello. A wonderful night out thank you.

We had an incredible time here for dinner. The service and the food was amazing. The host went the extra mile to ensure we were seated at the garden terrace patio as requested, despite the busy night in the restaurant. Great place. Will return.

We go there about once a month. Love the whole experience. Nice decor, the food is delicious, made with quality fresh ingredients. Their specials are amazing.  We usually also have cheesecake for dessert. Yuuuuuumy! Best of all is the service. We love the staff, from the kind greeting as you enter all the way to the goodbye. A very special call out to Erenee. She s a true professional. Well informed most gracious and respectful. We love her good humour and high energy. Thank you Giardino!

Such an amazing We went to Carderos on Saturday night for dinner.  food is incredible and so fresh! I had an amazing special that included salmon, prawns, and scallops, and my friend had halibut - YUM! Our server was also the nicest guy with such prompt service. Cant wait to come back!

Its been a long time since I had had dinner at il Giardino and its as great as I remembered!  The food is amazing as is the service.  The new location is even more inviting than the old location.  I had the fettuccine with snow crab and mung beans.  I was initially a little concerned that the portion was a bit small (I tend to over eat a bit) but it turned out to be a perfect size.  Five stars!

Had dinner at Giardinos on St. Patricks evening. Had the veal scallopini with prawns. Outstanding and the blueberry cheesecake was decadent. Great service for our party of seven with everyone loving their meals. Definitely one of the best places to dine in all of Vancouver.

A gem in Vancouver. A beautiful breezy patio was the backdrop to an absolutely delectable meal. The cannelloni was perfection and paired with an excellent bottle of Chianti. Ambience is everything at this place. The host couldnt have been busier but made a grand effort to ensure we had patio seating for our wedding anniversary. Thank you Giaridinos - youll be seeing more of us!

When I told one of the ex-wives that I had gotten another reservation at, Il Giardino, she told me that this time, if I was going to write another review, that I should keep it simple, and that I should not write a whole book. Personally, I love reading my writing, but I will take her words under advisement, and will keep this review a little more manageable. I was excited when I got to the restaurant a few minutes before my reservation. They took me to a little table with a great view of the kitchen. I so enjoy watching a professional kitchen work in the heat of dinner service. A few of their crew members seemed to remember me from the last time that I was there, and they had me feeling at ease and laughing out loud in no time. I decided to go with three of the specials which were described to me when I was ordering. I started with the shrimp salad.
Great restaurant with terrific ambiance matched with  superb service.

What a fantastic evening and dining experience.  My wife took me there for my birthday dinner and we had a great time with our server and the excellent cuisine.  My negroni was spectacular to start and everything proceeded to get better from there.  It was a little cramped/tight and the restaurant was full to capacity on a Friday night.  If youre looking for some great food in a kind of buzzing, happening environment... you could do far worse that Giardino.  Well be back for sure!

Amazing ambience, service, and food. You really get what you pay for here. The price point is relatively high but it s very worth it for any special occasion or date night. Make sure to try the Buffalo mozzarella!

They make the best Chocolate martini. The food is literally that of heaven. It does get busy. Though the staff os very respectable. They are very clean, humble and fashionable.  An absolute treat every time you dine there in my opinion. Clean, fast, productive service and astonishing food. Go. Its worth it. Ciao.
Super fast and friendly wait staff. Food was excellent and decor was cuisine appropriate. Dessert was especially delicious! Thank you to the staff for making it a covid safe experience as well

The best Italian in the city!!! Amazing food and service every single time we eat here.  I cannot say enough positive things about the food or service here.  Quite simply: if you are willing to spend the money for it, then this is the best Italian food you will have in Vancouver.  The service is also of the highest quality, with incredibly attentive and well-trained staff, a sommelier who has recommended excellent suggestions every time and it even has a few options for vegans though admittedly you will be limited to either one salad, one soup, or one of two pastas (all of which are fantastic). Also, got to meet the owner, Umberto, was a super nice guy.
Best weeknight girls night and Shaheen was amazing!

Reserving a table was easy through their online reservation feature. The restaurant was beautiful and created this a nice atmosphere to dine in. I ordered the Chicken stuffed tortellini, and it was delicious. Caroline was our server for the night who made our dining experience a 5 star experience.

What a beautiful restaurant - we experienced world class service and meal in a comfortable and warm dining experience! Everything from location, design, greeting to finishing touches is beautiful, welcoming and really first class! Perfect for a night out on the town - delicious Italian food with outstanding service!

Simply the best Italian food you will find in Vancouver. My husband is an Italian immigrant and chooses this restaurant for any and all special occasions because it reminds him of home. You wont be disappointed. The service is always outstanding (Francois is our personal favorite waiter!) the food delectable and the atmosphere romantic.

Had a delicious dinner at this Italian restaurant, I would definitely return next time Im in town. Just a note for other visitors though, a lot of their meals I found to be classic Italian dishes but with twists. So if youre looking for straight forwards Italian dishes, perhaps ask your server if they can change it up or maybe look elsewhere.

Fantastic Italian food and excellent service. I would have ordered every single item on the menu, but physics got in the way. The lettuce with goat cheese beautifully combined the nippy taste of the goat cheese and the sweetness of the vinaigrette, the spaghetti carbonara had exactly the right amount of pancetta and egg. The wine list has an excellent choice of all-Italian bottles, and a good selection by the glass and even half-glass if you want to keep sipping but dont want to order a full glass.
Absolutely excellent. Never had a bad experience. Truly a fantastic experience for those who love classic Italian cuisine with an upscale twist. If you haven t been. Just go.

By far the best Italian restaurant in Vancouver!  Chef/owner Umberto Menghi has multiple restaurants and a Villa in Tuscany.  The restaurant oozes with warmth, comfort, and quality. And the same goes for the food and staff. An extraordinary local gem.

Lots of menu options, especially for gluten-free. The customer service here is amazing, good ambiance, decor, and location dt. Their lattes look like European lattes and are just as delicious! The server Carolina is always super friendly and attentive, and the restaurant is always packed, so be sure to make a reso. I suggested this restaurant for our christmas party dinner and all 20+ staff loved it, and they had never been before.
Great ambience and service. Quite expensive. Did not know it existed until I ate there.
